title: Greatest Class-Action Lawsuit Hits
sub_head: ‘Better Call Saul’ has nothing on these dubious claims.
body:
“Better Call Saul” is an entertaining TV show about a fast-talking plaintiff attorney-turned-criminal defense lawyer. But even Saul Goodman may blush at some of the real class-action suits these days.
Start with the sweater that supposedly unraveled Gloria Miramontes. In late 2019 she bought a burgundy V-neck from a Ralph Lauren Polo Factory store in El Paso. The sweater found its way from Ms. Miramontes’ shopping bag to a lab and now a lawsuit in federal court in New York.
